titles.title: Repeatedly Flooded Communities Preparation Act
Repeatedly Flooded Communities Preparation Act
A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to ensure community accountability for areas repetitively damaged by floods, and for other purposes.
Repeatedly Flooded Communities Preparation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
